article.title: The Last Mile in Beta-Cell Replacement Therapy for Type 1 Diabetes: Time to Grow Up
article.abstract: Beta cell replacement therapy for type 1 diabetes (T1D) is undergoing a transformative shift, driven by advances in stem cell biology, gene editing, and tissue engineering.
article.insights_summary: Translating breakthroughs in beta cell replacement therapy into scalable, widely accessible treatments poses significant challenges. A Quality by Design approach is proposed to bridge the “last mile” and make beta cell therapy a viable, widely accessible treatment.
